title: Sampler, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, cross, tent, satin, and back stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Spot sampler with cattered floral, geometric, and religious motifs.  Floral initial J, other initials L, P, J, S, D.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, cross, tent, satin, and back stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-442.
